awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Returning from the War, Noah Lark discovers his family is gone. With a passion for fishing, Noah travels to a new town in search of a legendary great bass that has yet to be caught. On his journey he learns that with great friendship and great faith he will always be happy.

title: The Valley of Light
